title: Buy Repco Home Finance post Q3 earnings: IDBI Capital - Myiris.com
content: Buy Repco Home Finance post Q3 earnings: IDBI Capital  Myiris.com
description: Repco Home Finance asset quality deteriorates with Gross stage 3 assets at 4.6% versus 4.3% QoQ (7% - RBI classification norms). Restructured assets (OTR 1.0 &2.0) stood at 6% as of Q3FY22. Loa
